data.name: Hood: Outlaws & Legends - Battle Pass - 20 Tier Skip Pack
data.detailed_description:
Tier Skips apply instantly after purchase and are only compatible with a Battle Pass.

Secure your unique and exclusive cosmetics with the Battle Pass 20 Tier Skip Pack. This pack immediately unlocks the next 20 tiers to progress through the tiers of a Battle Pass before the current Season ends.
data.about_the_game:
Tier Skips apply instantly after purchase and are only compatible with a Battle Pass.

Secure your unique and exclusive cosmetics with the Battle Pass 20 Tier Skip Pack. This pack immediately unlocks the next 20 tiers to progress through the tiers of a Battle Pass before the current Season ends.
data.short_description: Only compatible with a Battle Pass. Secure your exclusive cosmetics with the Battle Pass 20 Tier Skip Pack. This pack immediately unlocks the next 20 tiers to progress through the tiers of a Battle Pass before the current Season ends.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 X6 / Intel Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, Radeon HD 7870 / GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 40 FPS, 1920x1080 in low.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, Radeon RX 590 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS, 1920x1080 in ultra.
